Transfuse blood.sentence: The healthcare provider verifies the patient's identity and blood type.
Transfuse blood.subject: The healthcare provider
Transfuse blood.object: the patient's identity and blood type
Transfuse blood.tools: patient identification bracelet, blood type records

Transfuse blood.sentence: The nurse prepares the blood product for transfusion by checking the expiration date and compatibility.
Transfuse blood.subject: The nurse
Transfuse blood.tools: blood bag, compatibility report, expiration check

Transfuse blood.sentence: The nurse establishes an intravenous (IV) access site on the patient.
Transfuse blood.subject: The nurse

Transfuse blood.sentence: The nurse connects the blood bag to the IV line and starts the transfusion at a regulated rate.
Transfuse blood.subject: The nurse
Transfuse blood.object: the blood bag to the IV line
Transfuse blood.tools: blood transfusion set, IV pump or gravity drip

Transfuse blood.sentence: The healthcare provider monitors the patient for any adverse reactions during the transfusion.
Transfuse blood.subject: The healthcare provider
Transfuse blood.object: the patient for any adverse reactions
